title: Vertical Horizontal Filter
content:
The vertical horizontal filter evaluates whether prices are currently trending or in a consolidation phase. The calculation uses the ratio of the difference between the maximum and minimum values to the sum of the values for a certain period, taking into account the selected data source.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Calculation

NameDescription
Period Specifies the quantity of recent candles to include in the calculations.
Type Represents one of the available data source types.

Options:
  • Volume
  • Ticks
  • Ask
  • Bids
  • Open
  • High
  • Low
  • Close
  • OHLC average
  • HLC average
  • HL average

Visualization

NameDescription
Color Specifies the color for this element.

Misc

NameDescription
Show description The parameter controls the visibility of the indicator's name and its parameters on the chart, enabling the display of this information to be toggled on or off.
